sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Item: ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax: ${cart.shippingPrice}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
